guide.introduction: Here is how you can run a 12-volt fan (or other low-current 12v device) from two 9-volt batteries. Refer to the diagram on the right.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Here is how you can run a 12-volt fan (or other low-current 12v device) from two 9-volt batteries. Refer to the diagram on the right.

Relevant parts
  • 1/4W 470 k ohm resistor, Small Switch, LED, Circuit Board,Some Wire,9v battery.

parts.text: 1/4W 470 k ohm resistor, Small Switch, LED, Circuit Board,Some Wire,9v battery.
